i love sharks.

I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction.
i m taking online classes.
i listen to music for more than 5 hours a day.
My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.

content.text: I love to travel! Did you go anywhere fun for vacation?
My family took a road trip across the country and I got to see some awesome sights.
That sounds so cool! I wish I could take a road trip.
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of driving.
I bet! How long did it take you?
It took us about two weeks.
It was, but we saw a lot of great places.
What was your favorite place you visited?
My favorite place was Yosemite National Park.
I've heard that's a beautiful place.
It is! The mountains are amazing and the waterfalls are breathtaking.
That sounds like an amazing place to visit.
It is! I highly recommend it.
I'll definitely have to add it to my list of places to visit.
